title: The 'Alaka' Diamond Kada - Contemporary Elegance with a Traditional Touch
materials: G-H Color). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: A modern take on the classic kada, this 'Alaka' bangle features a graceful, wave-like design crafted in rose gold. Each curve is meticulously set with sparkling round brilliant cut diamonds, creating a continuous stream of light. The open setting maximizes the brilliance of each stone. Inspired by the flow of the Godavari river, the design embodies fluid beauty.
occasions: Perfect for both traditional South Indian occasions such as weddings (Vivaham)
and modern celebrations. Elevates everyday style or adds a touch of sophistication to evening wear.
description: This Kada seamlessly blends modern design with timeless elegance. The rose gold offers a contemporary warmth, while the diamonds provide exquisite sparkle. Durable construction ensures lasting wear. Makes a statement piece for the discerning woman who appreciates both tradition and contemporary style. Handcrafted in Hyderabad by skilled artisans.
